form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
form.official-title: To authorize the transfer of certain funds to improve security at United States embassies and other diplomatic facilities worldwide, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Embassy Security Funds Transfer Act of 2013.

section.header: Transfer of certain funds for improvement of security at United States embassies and other diplomatic facilities worldwide

subsection.text: Funds appropriated by title VIII of the Department of State, Foreign Operations, and Related Programs Appropriations Act of 2012 (division I of Public Law 112â€“74; 125 Stat. 1265) under the headings Diplomatic and Consular Programs and Embassy Security, Construction, and Maintenance may be transferred between such headings.

paragraph.text: Any funds transferred to a heading under subsection (a) shall be merged with funds in the heading to which transferred, and shall, except as provided in paragraph (2), be available subject to the same terms and conditions as the funds with which merged.
Any funds transferred under subsection (a) shall be available for the same period for which such funds were originally appropriated.

subsection.text: Any transfer of funds under subsection (a) shall be subject to the regular notification procedures of the Committees on Appropriations of the Senate and the House of Representatives.
